mapper.sql: uuid, userId, `name`, `status`, `type`, sendName, receiveName, sendCity, sendAddress, receiveCity, receiveAddress, money, sendTime, receiveTime, sendPhone, receivePhone, weight
mapper.insert: insert into express(uuid, userId, name, status, type, sendName, receiveName, sendCity, sendAddress, receiveCity, receiveAddress, money, sendTime, receiveTime, sendPhone, receivePhone, weight) VALUES (#{express.uuid}, #{express.userId}, #{express.name}, 0, #{express.type}, #{express.sendName}, #{express.receiveName}, #{express.sendCity}, #{express.sendAddress}, #{express.receiveCity}, #{express.receiveAddress}, #{express.money}, #{express.sendTime}, #{express.receiveTime}, #{express.sendPhone}, #{express.receivePhone}, #{express.weight})

insert into express (userId, `name`, `status`, `type`, sendName, receiveName, sendCity, sendAddress, receiveCity, receiveAddress, money, sendTime, receiveTime, sendPhone, receivePhone, weight) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

mapper.update:
update express
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sendName = #{sendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiveName = #{receivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sendAddress = #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiveCity = #{receivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiveAddress = #{receiveaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

receiveTime = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sendPhone = #{sendphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receivePhone = #{receivephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update express set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendName = #{sendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiveName = #{receivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendCity = #{sendcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendAddress = #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiveCity = #{receivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiveAddress = #{receiveaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sendTime = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receiveTime = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sendPhone = #{sendphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receivePhone = #{receivephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from express where userId=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by sendTime
